author: thomreis
body:
A few additional histograms for the L1 muon online DQM.

- Add dR, dEta, and dPhi histograms for L1 muons pairs.
- Add invariant mass plots for L1 muon pairs.
- Add dEta and dPhi vs. pT histograms for the coordinates at the vertex minus the coordinates at the muon stations.
title: L1 muon online DQM upgrades
